description:
Training Report
Training Goals:
'Get There'
Recommendations: When repeatedly asked what the hell she wants here, she goes from noncommittal grunts to vague responses like 'I want to get there'. This trainee's commitment is questionable at best, and we put her to work in the basement to break down her airs and test her obedience.
We acquaint her with that which she despises the most, dirt. She finds it disgusting, displaying her lack of humility and dignity in labor. Her performance earns her a painful stress position that she barely whimpers through.
Throughout, she whines like a brat, curses and flagrantly disrespects her trainer, makes off handed threats about some retaliation from her dominant, then denies ever saying any of it. All the while she smugly stands on the merits of some 'past training' that she thinks we actually care about here. The only thing just barely keeping her from being fired is our commitment to Sarge.
But, we stick it out and continue to dig into Maya's perceptions of submission. We finally get tired of her bullshit and fuck her silly, leaving her filthy and naked, locked in a closet till she promises to not be an insolent little cunt any longer. We shall see.
title: The Training of Maya Matthews, Day Two
